basics.name: Arianna Pera
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: I am a PhD student in Computational Social Science at the IT University of Copenhagen, in the NERDS Research Group. My interests include the study of collective behavior in social systems, both from NLP and network science perspectives.

work.name: IT University of Copenhagen
work.summary: I am part of the Collective Coordinatio through Online Social Media research project, under the supervision of Professor Luca Maria Aiello. My research focuses on analyzing the key elements driving instances of collective behavior on online social media, in the context of climate change mitigation strategies.

volunteer.summary: DataBeers is a recurring event that brings together an interdisciplinary crowd of data enthusiasts to listen to captivating data stories. As a co-organizer, I am responsible for the organization of the event, including the selection of speakers and social media promotion.

education.thesis: Title: 'Sentence-level explaination of word embeddings association: generalization of current approaches.'
